View Javadoc
1   package com.test.vendor.neo4j;
2   
3   import com.jsql.model.InjectionModel;
4   import com.jsql.model.exception.JSqlException;
5   import com.jsql.view.terminal.SystemOutTerminal;
6   import org.junitpioneer.jupiter.RetryingTest;
7   
8   public class Neo4jNormalGetSuiteIT extends ConcreteNeo4jSuiteIT {
9       
10      @Override
11      public void setupInjection() throws Exception {
12          
13          InjectionModel model = new InjectionModel();
14          this.injectionModel = model;
15  
16          model.subscribe(new SystemOutTerminal());
17  
18          model.getMediatorUtils().getParameterUtil().initializeQueryString(
19              "http://localhost:8080/neo4j?name=1"
20          );
21  
22          model
23          .getMediatorUtils()
24          .getConnectionUtil()
25          .withMethodInjection(model.getMediatorMethod().getQuery())
26          .withTypeRequest("GET");
27  
28          model.getMediatorVendor().setVendorByUser(model.getMediatorVendor().getNeo4j());
29          model.beginInjection();
30      }
31      
32      @Override
33      @RetryingTest(3)
34      public void listDatabases() throws JSqlException {
35          super.listDatabases();
36      }
37      
38      @Override
39      @RetryingTest(3)
40      public void listTables() throws JSqlException {
41          super.listTables();
42      }
43      
44      @Override
45      @RetryingTest(3)
46      public void listColumns() throws JSqlException {
47          super.listColumns();
48      }
49      
50      @Override
51      @RetryingTest(3)
52      public void listValues() throws JSqlException {
53          super.listValues();
54      }
55  }
